# Slide



## Props
| Name | Type | Default | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| direction |  | 'down' |  |
| enterTransitionDuration |  | duration.enteringScreen |  |
| leaveTransitionDuration |  | duration.leavingScreen |  |
| theme |  | {} |  |

Any other properties supplied will be spread to the root element.
